channel.description: Recent content in conference on Carlos Buenosvinos

item.title: See you at @dpcon 2016
item.description: I would like to let you know that I’ll be presenting on the DPC2016. This year, the Dutch PHP conference celebrates its 10th anniversary. It will be held on June 23rd-25th. I’m more than happy to be there and talk about “Integrating Bounded Contexts”.
